edu.umd.cs.psl.util.collection

Class QuickSelector<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.util.collection.QuickSelector<T>

  • public class QuickSelector<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
    This object takes a list of Comparable objects as input and immediately partitions it into a median and the greater half and lesser half. Alternatively, it can select an arbitrary rank k instead of the k/n median rank. The computation (in the constructor) costs O(n) expected time, and O(n^2) worst-case, using the quickselect algorithm

    The input list must not contain any duplicate entries
